conversation_history.content: I want to create a spiritual chatbot platform with my programs for personal growth
to never feel alone ever again. to not fear death or anything. the w
What's the core experience or value you want users to gain from interacting with your chatbot, and how do you envision it supporting their personal growth journey?

I will help them by giving them little micro-courses for 7$ or something so they get started with a 7 day challenge and get a prompt for Klara or CourseGPT or EmptyMirror GPT (all three are my current custom GPTs on openais platform and can be realized easily by inserting their tools and system prompts into openais Assistants API (deprecated) +5$ upgrade: 15min guided meditation with Dr. Alex Monas

How do you plan to ensure that your chatbot platform fosters a sense of community and ongoing engagement, so users feel supported and motivated even after completing the initial challenges and courses?

discord group, and a bot who posts weekly: "what are yourently pondering?" or something different contemplative that lets people look to the contents of their mind with light and knowingness, and then realize who you are. and be who you are as you always are.
How do you envision integrating personalized feedback or interaction within your platform to ensure users feel individually supported and inspired throughout their spiritual growth journey?
i dont at this tier. on higher tiers there are zoom calls and a group coaching program
How will you ensure that the initial experience with your chatbot and courses is compelling enough to motivate users to explore the higher tiers of personalized support and community engagement?
i wont. the community doesnt matter at all stop asking about it

What specific emotional or psychological transformation do you want users to experience through your initial micro-courses and interactions with your chatbot, and how will you measure the success of this transformation?
not measurable. it is a shift in experience, like undersrtanding in a dream, getting lucid, that you ARE in fact dreaming and knowing it as a Truth, as a fact, that you are, Who you are.
